title: Mobile Application-Based Newborn Nursing Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Nursing Knowledge and Understanding of Newborn Developmental Stages
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining self-directed learning and group collaboration activities using digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe four or more stages of the newborn physical examination procedure.
Learners can identify five critical danger signs in newborns and propose corresponding response strategies.
Learners can complete vaccination schedule management scenarios with an 80% or higher success rate using simulation modules within a mobile application.
Learners can design newborn family education scenarios based on instructional materials for nutrition and oral health management.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
